details: No outside beverages allowed to be brought in. No outside alcohol, drinks, food, bottles, cups, etc. allowed
Thunder Road Grill closed on Sundays. Small bar open for beer and wine only
Family venue - no profanity or disrespectful behavior
All young folks must be supervised - no running/playing inside
Concession stand - hot dogs and BBQ - adult beverages available (Beach shows and winter cruise-ins only)
Cover charge may change for special events
Midway Town Center Shopping Center - Exit 100 off Hwy 52
